DOC.brief_title: Duloxetine Compared With Placebo Patients With Generalized Anxiety Disorder
DOC.criteria: Male female outpatient least 18 year age Have previously complete withdrawn study study investigate duloxetine previously treat duloxetine Patient diagnose major depressive disorder within past 6 month Patient diagnose panic disorder , posttraumatic stress disorder , eat disorder within past year History alcohol psychoactive substance abuse dependence within past 6 month
